name: Horror Prototype (Joe Jastrzembski)
description:
This is a project that I started about a year ago, hoping to learn different aspects of Unity. While working on this project I have become a better coder, dipped into shader work, learned a lot about the don'ts of level design and just experimented with different tools. While this isn't my most recent/finest work I feel like it will serve well as a benchmark of my skill progression.

 The game is lacking polish and there are most likely a decent amount of bugs. If you have any feedback please feel free to share it, I know that this project is far from perfect but I'm using it as a learning experience. 

The goal of the game is collect 3 tools scattered around the island, then escape on a boat. 

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Interact

Left Mouse - Equip/Unequip Torch (when you have some)

Right Mouse - Use FireCrackers (When you have some)

Escape - Exit menu

Assets:

I used various assets from the Unity Assets store, some free and some purchased. I also used some sounds from FreeSound.org.
